ai-patthana8.46:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.46:1.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on the teaching, or causes.
ai-patthana8.46:1.1_1: Not by view arises dependent on the teaching, or by not grasping.
ai-patthana8.46:1.1_2: Not grasping arises dependent on the teaching, and thoughts don’t arise for a reason.
ai-patthana8.46:2.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on the teaching, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana8.46:3.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on the teaching, and those who don’t give rise to the teaching. Contact causes and conditions to be conditioned.
ai-patthana8.46:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of the objects of five years. ...
